Text: Who is the idiot who put video files in RARs?
Thanks for the many great uploads Sceneline :)
The "RARS?" comments are so funny.... I'm putting all my torrents in RARs from now on.

426,233,856 bytes for rar file & 426,184,704 bytes for actual files.  Thankyou for saving me 49152 bytes! You've saved my internet connection! Gonna go and download a small word document with all the savings! woohoo!  But on a serious note, great quality video, keep up the good work!

Do not be noob. Scene groups made releases RARing:

http://x264.nl/tvx2642011-2.nfo

Unraring only takes 2 minutes. You dont like rar's ? Download from another uploader, but rar's are more trusted than no rar's. Rules of 720p scene groups:

- Releases must be packed in RAR file format
- Rars must be in multiples of 50 MB, no more than 101 files (.rar-.r99)
if using old-style naming, or 99 (.part01.rar-.part99.rar) if using new-style naming. 1MB = 1,000,000 bytes


Learn about scene.
